sentences.chinese: 他用力踢门。

sentences.chinese: 这些圆盘是行星形成的剩余物质。

name: educator

sentences.chinese: 除了学生的学习兴趣，教育者们别无所求。

sentences.chinese: 儿童的常见病她小时候都得过。

sentences.chinese: 乌云提醒我带上雨衣。

sentences.english: If I had taken my raincoat with me this morning, I would not be wet now.
sentences.chinese: (从句指过去,主句指现在)。如果我今天早上带了雨衣，现在就不会被淋湿了。

detailed_translations.english: a coat that you wear to protect yourself from rain

name: force
trans: n. 力量；武力；军队；魄力
vt. 促使，推动；强迫；强加

sentences.english: Westerly gales forced the ship off course.
sentences.chinese: 强劲的西风将那艘船吹离了航道。

sentences.english: Firemen entering the building were forced back by flames.
sentences.chinese: 冲进大楼的消防队员被火焰挡了回来。

sentences.english: She tried to keep the door shut but the man forced it open .
sentences.chinese: 她不想打开门，但那男人硬是把它推开了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 强迫；用力推动，用力打开
detailed_translations.english: to make someone or something move in a particular direction or into a different position, especially through or using great strength

detailed_translations.chinese: 军队， 兵力； 暴力， 武力； 力， 力气； 影响力， 效力
detailed_translations.english: military action used as a way of achieving your aims

name: pressure
trans: n. 压力；压迫，[物] 压强

sentences.english: They are putting pressure on people to vote yes.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在向民众施加压力，要求他们投赞成票。

sentences.english: You must never give in to pressure .
sentences.chinese: 你绝不能屈从压力。

detailed_translations.english: an attempt to persuade someone by using influence, arguments, or threats

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…施加压力， 迫使， 说服
detailed_translations.english: to try to make someone do something by making them feel it is their duty to do it

name: conclude
trans: vt. 推断；决定，作结论；结束

sentences.english: When the investigation is concluded, the results will be sent to the US Attorney’s office.
sentences.chinese: 等到调查结束后，结果会被送到联邦检察官办公室。

sentences.english: Francis, having concluded his business with James, left for Miami.
sentences.chinese: 弗朗西斯完成了和詹姆斯的买卖后就去了迈阿密。

detailed_translations.english: to complete something you have been doing, especially for a long time

detailed_translations.chinese: 推断出，推论出；缔结，议定
detailed_translations.english: to decide that something is true after considering all the information you have

name: holder
trans: n. 持有人；所有人；固定器；（台、架等）支持物

sentences.english: the 800 m world record holder
sentences.chinese: 800米世界纪录保持者

sentences.english: Season-ticket holders are furious at the rise in rail fares.
sentences.chinese: 买季票的人对火车票价上涨极为愤怒。

sentences.english: British passport holders
sentences.chinese: 英国护照持有人

detailed_translations.chinese: 持有人；所有人；固定器；（台、架等）支持物
detailed_translations.english: someone who owns or controls something

sentences.english: a shallow river
sentences.chinese: 浅河

sentences.english: The lake is quite shallow.
sentences.chinese: 这湖很浅。

sentences.english: the shallow end of the pool
sentences.chinese: 游泳池的浅水区

sentences.english: Place the meat in a shallow dish.
sentences.chinese: 把肉放在一个浅盘里。

detailed_translations.english: measuring only a short distance from the top to the bottom

name: lighter
trans: n. 打火机；驳船；点火者
adj. 明亮的；光明的；照明好的；光线充足的

sentences.english: He immediately snapped his lighter to light her cigarette.
sentences.chinese: 他啪的一声急忙打着他的打火机，给她的香烟点着了。

detailed_translations.english: a small object that produces a flame for lighting cigarettes etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 明亮的；光明的；照明好的；光线充足的

name: match
trans: vt. 使比赛；使相配；敌得过，比得上；相配；与…竞争
vi. 比赛；匹配；相配，相称；相比
n. 比赛，竞赛；匹配；对手；火柴

sentences.english: It’s our last match of the season.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们本赛季最后一场比赛。

sentences.english: They’re preparing for a big match tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 他们在为明天的一场大赛做准备。

sentences.english: McClaire’s goal earned him the title of man of the match (= the person in a team who plays best ) .
sentences.chinese: 麦克莱尔的进球为他赢得了“本场最佳球员”的称号。

sentences.english: Carlos was no match for the champion.
sentences.chinese: 卡洛斯根本不是冠军的对手。

detailed_translations.english: an organized sports event between two teams or people

name: examine
trans: vt. 检查；调查； 检测；考试

sentences.english: A team of divers was sent down to examine the wreck.
sentences.chinese: 一组潜水员被送到水下检查沉船。

sentences.english: Hegel’s philosophy will be examined in detail in Chapter 4.
sentences.chinese: 黑格尔的哲学将在第4章作详细探讨。

detailed_translations.english: to look at something carefully and thoroughly because you want to find out more about it

name: oxygen
trans: n. [化学] 氧气，[化学] 氧

sentences.english: The human brain needs to be without oxygen for only four minutes before permanent damage occurs.
sentences.chinese: 人脑缺氧只需4分钟就会造成永久性损伤。

detailed_translations.english: a gas that has no colour or smell, is present in air, and is necessary for most animals and plants to live. It is a chemical element: symbol O

name: telescope
trans: n. 望远镜；缩叠式旅行袋

sentences.english: The captain was rectifying his telescope.
sentences.chinese: 船长正在调他的望远镜。

sentences.english: The telescope reveals many distant stars to our sight.
sentences.chinese: 望远镜把许多遥远的星球显现在我们的眼前。

sentences.english: With the aid of a telescope a ship could be made out on the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 借助望远镜可以看出在地平线上有一只船。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment shaped like a tube, used for making distant objects look larger and closer

name: solar
trans: adj. 太阳的；日光的；利用太阳光的；与太阳相关的

sentences.english: a solar eclipse
sentences.chinese: 日食

detailed_translations.english: relating to the sun

name: certainly
trans: adv. 当然；行（用于回答）；必定

sentences.english: They’re certainly not mine.
sentences.chinese: “请给我来杯啤酒。”“好的，先生。”

sentences.english: ‘I’d like a beer, please.’ ‘Certainly, sir.’
sentences.chinese: “请给我来杯啤酒。”“好的，先生。”

sentences.english: ‘Can I come along?’ ‘Certainly.’
sentences.chinese: “我可以一起去吗？”“当然可以。”

detailed_translations.english: without doubt

sentences.english: Unless some extra money is found, the theatre will close.
sentences.chinese: 要是不能找到更多资金，剧院将要关闭。

sentences.english: I think you should complain – unless, of course, you are happy with the way things are.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得你应该发发牢骚——当然，除非你对现状很满意。

sentences.english: He won’t go to sleep unless you tell him a story.
sentences.chinese: 要是你不给他讲故事他就不睡觉。

sentences.english: I can’t leave her unless I know she’s all right.
sentences.chinese: 除非我知道她没事，否则我不能离开她。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that something will happen or be true if something else does not happen or is not true

name: double
trans: adv. 双重地；两倍地；弓身地
vi. 加倍，加倍努力；快步走

sentences.english: a double sink
sentences.chinese: 双水槽

sentences.english: a double wardrobe
sentences.chinese: 双门衣柜

sentences.english: the great double doors of the cathedral
sentences.chinese: 大教堂宏伟的双开大门

sentences.english: Don’t park your car on double yellow lines.
sentences.chinese: 不可以在双黄线处停车。

sentences.english: The city was enclosed by walls of double thickness.
sentences.chinese: 该城被两倍厚的墙围了起来。

detailed_translations.english: consisting of two parts that are similar or exactly the same

name: mystery
trans: n. 秘密，谜；神秘，神秘的事物；推理小说，推理剧；常作 mysteries 秘技，秘诀

sentences.english: Twenty years after the event, his death remains a mystery .
sentences.chinese: 事情过去二十年了，他的死仍然是个谜。

sentences.english: The way her mind worked was always a mystery to him.
sentences.chinese: 她脑子里在想些什么对他来说始终是个谜。

sentences.english: ‘Why did he do it?’ ‘I don’t know. It’s a complete mystery .’
sentences.chinese: “他为什么这么做？” “我不知道，这完全是个谜。”

sentences.english: The police never solved the mystery of Gray’s disappearance.
sentences.chinese: 警察一直没有侦破格雷失踪的谜案。

sentences.english: But why would anyone want to kill Jack? The mystery deepened .
sentences.chinese: 但为什么会有人想杀死杰克呢？疑团越来越深了。

sentences.english: What happened to the paintings after that is an unsolved mystery .
sentences.chinese: 后来那些画的命运如何是个不解之谜。

sentences.english: I don’t know how he got the job – it’s one of life’s little mysteries .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道他是怎么得到那份工作的——那永远是个小小的谜。

sentences.english: How life began on Earth is one of the great mysteries of science.
sentences.chinese: 地球生命的起源是一大科学谜团。

detailed_translations.english: an event, situation etc that people do not understand or cannot explain because they do not know enough about it

name: biology
trans: n. （一个地区全部的）生物；生物学

sentences.english: a degree in biology
sentences.chinese: 生物学学位

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of living things

name: butterfly
trans: n. 蝴蝶；蝶泳；举止轻浮的人；追求享乐的人

sentences.english: Butterflies and moths are attracted to the wild flowers.
sentences.chinese: 蝴蝶和飞蛾为野花所吸引。

detailed_translations.english: a type of insect that has large wings, often with beautiful colours

name: migrate
trans: vi. 移动；随季节而移居；移往

sentences.english: People migrate to cities like Jakarta in search of work.
sentences.chinese: 人们移居到雅加达这样的城市找工作。

sentences.english: Most birds have to fly long distances to migrate.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的鸟类不得不飞行很长的距离进行迁徙。

detailed_translations.english: if people migrate, they go to live in another area or country, especially in order to find work

name: fantastic
trans: adj. 奇异的；空想的；异想天开的；古怪的；极好的，极出色的；不可思议的；不切实际的

sentences.english: You look fantastic!
sentences.chinese: 你看上去棒极了！

sentences.english: It’s a fantastic place, really beautiful!
sentences.chinese: 这真是个好地方，漂亮极了！

detailed_translations.chinese: 极好的， 极出色的， 了不起的； 极大的； 难以相信的； 异想天开的， 不实际的； 奇异的， 古怪的
detailed_translations.english: extremely good, attractive, enjoyable etc

name: completely
trans: adv. 完全地，彻底地；完整地

sentences.english: I completely forgot that it’s his birthday today.
sentences.chinese: 我完全忘了今天是他的生日。

sentences.english: He had never completely recovered from his illness.
sentences.chinese: 他病后一直没有完全康复。

sentences.english: a completely new range of low-cost computers
sentences.chinese: 全新的低价电脑系列

sentences.english: I’m not completely sure.
sentences.chinese: 我不能十分肯定。

sentences.english: Portuguese is pronounced completely differently from Spanish.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄牙语的发音和西班牙语的完全不同。

detailed_translations.english: to the greatest degree possible

name: grandchild
trans: n. 孙子；孙女；外孙；外孙女

sentences.english: Mary loves her grandchildren.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽很疼爱她的孙子孙女们。

detailed_translations.english: the child of your son or daughter

name: female
trans: n. 女人；[动] 雌性动物
adj. 女性的；雌性的；柔弱的，柔和的

sentences.english: female voters
sentences.chinese: 女性选民

sentences.english: Over half of the staff is female.
sentences.chinese: 半数以上的员工是女性。

detailed_translations.english: relating to women or girls
an animal that belongs to the sex that can have babies or produce eggs

name: milkweed
trans: n. 乳草属植物；马利筋属植物；野参类

sentences.english: This is because their staple food, milkweed, is being used more and more as a garden ornament.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为它们的主要食物乳草被越来越多的用于园林装饰。

detailed_translations.english: any plant of the mostly North American genus Asclepias, having milky sap and pointed pods that split open to release tufted seeds: family Asclepiadaceae

name: chemical
trans: n. 化学制品，化学药品

sentences.english: the chemical composition of bleach
sentences.chinese: 漂白剂的化学成分

sentences.english: a chemical analysis of the soil
sentences.chinese: 对土壤的化学分析

sentences.english: synthetic chemicals
sentences.chinese: 合成化学品

detailed_translations.english: relating to substances, the study of substances, or processes involving changes in substances
relating to substances, the study of substances, or processes involving changes in substances

name: puzzling
trans: adj. 使迷惑的；使莫名其妙的

sentences.english: a puzzling fact
sentences.chinese: 令人费解的情况

sentences.english: Gary found her reaction puzzling.
sentences.chinese: 加里对她的反应感到迷惑。

detailed_translations.english: confusing and difficult to understand or explain

name: DNA
trans: abbr. 脱氧核糖核酸（deoxyribonucleic acid）；（美国）国防部核子局 （Defense Nuclear Agency）

sentences.english: At the moment, the regulation on how much human DNA can be put into an animal is vague.
sentences.chinese: 目前，有关多少人类脱氧核糖核酸可以放入一只动物身上的规定，还很模糊。

sentences.english: By changing the tomato’s genetic blueprint , scientists can alter the rate at which it ripens.
sentences.chinese: 科学家可以通过改变番茄的基因蓝图来改变它的成熟速度。

detailed_translations.english: a plan for achieving something

name: general
trans: n. 一般；将军，上将；常规
adj. 一般的，普通的；综合的；大体的

sentences.english: There has been a general decline in standards.
sentences.chinese: 道德水准普遍下降。

sentences.english: ways to improve your general health
sentences.chinese: 全面提高身体素质的方法

sentences.english: There is one exception to this general principle.
sentences.chinese: 这个一般性原则有一例外

sentences.english: a four-star general
sentences.chinese: 四星上将

detailed_translations.english: affecting all or most people, places or things
an officer of very high rank in the army or air force

sentences.english: a complex system of highways
sentences.chinese: 复杂的公路网

sentences.english: Photosynthesis is a highly complex process.
sentences.chinese: 光合作用是一个非常复杂的过程。

sentences.english: Peter seemed to have an instant understanding of the most complex issues.
sentences.chinese: 再复杂的问题彼得似乎也是一看就明白。

sentences.english: It was a very complex relationship between two complex people.
sentences.chinese: 这是两个复杂的人之间非常复杂的关系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 由许多部分组成的，复合的；复杂的，难懂的
detailed_translations.english: consisting of many different parts and often difficult to understand

detailed_translations.chinese: 综合体， 集合体； 情结， 夸大的情绪反应
detailed_translations.english: a group of buildings, or a large building with many parts, used for a particular purpose

sentences.english: I always confounded him with his twin brother.
sentences.chinese: 我总分不清他和他的孪生兄弟。

sentences.english: The twin brothers were removed from our class.
sentences.chinese: 这一对孪生兄弟已从我们班转走。

sentences.english: The twin brothers bled for their country and died without any regrets.
sentences.chinese: 这对孪生兄弟为国流血牺牲， 死而无憾。

sentences.english: Can you repeat your question?
sentences.chinese: 你能重复一遍你的问题吗？

sentences.english: Sorry - could you repeat that?
sentences.chinese: 对不起——你能再说一遍吗？

sentences.english: It is not, I repeat not, my fault.
sentences.chinese: 那不是我的错，我再说一遍，不是。

sentences.english: It was a terrible journey - I hope we don’t have a repeat performance (= have the same thing happen again ) on the way home.
sentences.chinese: 这一路上太糟糕了——我希望回程可不要再发生同样的事。

detailed_translations.english: to say or write something again
an event that is very like something that happened before

sentences.english: Weather patterns have changed in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 气候模式近年已经发生了变化。

sentences.english: A general pattern began to emerge .
sentences.chinese: 一个总体模式开始显现。

sentences.english: Their descriptions seemed to follow a set pattern (= always develop in the same way ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的描述似乎依据固定的模式。

sentences.english: His behavior fits a pattern of violent acts.
sentences.chinese: 他的举动符合暴力行为的模式。

sentences.english: a dress pattern
sentences.chinese: 连衣裙的纸样

detailed_translations.english: the regular way in which something happens, develops, or is done

name: identify
trans: vt. 确定；鉴定；识别，辨认出；使参与；把…看成一样 vi. 确定；认同；一致

sentences.english: He was too far away to be able to identify faces.
sentences.chinese: 他离得太远，没法看面孔认出谁是谁。

sentences.english: The police took fingerprints and identified the body.
sentences.chinese: 警方采集了指纹，对尸体作了身份确认。

detailed_translations.english: to recognize and correctly name someone or something

name: related
trans: adj. 有关系的，有关联的；讲述的，叙述的

sentences.english: My grandson's birthday was on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 我孙子的生日是星期二。

detailed_translations.english: the son of your son or daughter

sentences.english: a drawing of my granddaughter Amelia
sentences.chinese: 一幅我孙女阿梅莉亚的画像

detailed_translations.english: the daughter of your son or daughter

name: instruction
trans: n. 指令，命令；指示；教导；用法说明

sentences.english: (= I have been told ) to give the package to him personally.
sentences.chinese: 我接到的指示是亲手把包裹交给他。

sentences.english: Make sure you carry out the doctor’s instructions.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要遵照医生的嘱咐。

sentences.english: The school gives instruction in first aid.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校教授急救课

detailed_translations.english: a statement telling someone what they must do

name: affect
trans: n. 情感；引起感情的因素
vt. 影响；感染；感动；假装

sentences.english: the areas affected by the hurricane
sentences.chinese: 受飓风影响的地区

sentences.english: a disease that affects the central nervous system
sentences.chinese: 影响中枢神经系统的疾病

sentences.english: decisions which affect our lives
sentences.chinese: 影响我们生活的决定

sentences.english: Trading has been adversely affected by the downturn in consumer spending.
sentences.chinese: 贸易受到消费支出回落的不利影响。

sentences.english: We were all deeply affected by her death.
sentences.chinese: 我们都为她的去世深感悲痛。

detailed_translations.english: to do something that produces an effect or change in something or in someone’s situation

name: suggest
trans: vt. 提议，建议；启发；使人想起；显示；暗示

sentences.english: The zoo asked its visitors to suggest a name for the new baby panda.
sentences.chinese: 动物园请游客提建议，给刚出生的大熊猫起一个名字。

sentences.english: It has been suggested that the manager will resign if any more players are sold.
sentences.chinese: 有人提议，如果再有球员被出售，球队主教练就辞职。

detailed_translations.chinese: 提议，建议；启发；使人想起；显示；暗示
detailed_translations.english: to tell someone your ideas about what they should do, where they should go etc

name: development
trans: n. 发展；开发；发育；住宅小区（专指由同一开发商开发的）；[摄] 显影

sentences.english: child development
sentences.chinese: 儿童发育

sentences.english: The funds will be used for marketing and product development.
sentences.chinese: 这笔资金将用于市场营销和产品开发。

detailed_translations.english: the process of gradually becoming bigger, better, stronger, or more advanced

sentences.english: mobile phone users
sentences.chinese: 移动电话用户

detailed_translations.english: a telephone that you can carry with you and use in any place

name: discovery
trans: n. 发现，发觉；被发现的事物

sentences.english: the discovery of oil in Alaska
sentences.chinese: 在阿拉斯加发现石油

sentences.english: The Hubble Telescope allowed astronomers to make significant discoveries about our galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 哈勃望远镜使天文学家对我们的银河系有了重大发现。

detailed_translations.english: when someone discovers something

name: involve
trans: vt. 包含；牵涉；使陷于；潜心于

sentences.english: What will the job involve?
sentences.chinese: 这份工作包括什么？

sentences.chinese: 这部电影的主题思想是善良终必战胜邪恶。

sentences.english: The result of this legal battle sends an important message to people in similar situations.
sentences.chinese: 这场诉讼战的结果给情况相似的人们传递了一个重要的信息。

sentences.english: It’s perfectly possible to get your message across (= communicate what you want to say ) without being so angry.
sentences.chinese: 就算不这么生气，你也完全可以把意思说清楚。

sentences.english: They use illustrations to convey their message.
sentences.chinese: 他们用图示来表达他们的意思。

detailed_translations.english: the main or most important idea that someone is trying to tell people about in a film, book, speech etc

name: check
trans: n. <美>支票；制止，抑制；检验，核对
vi. 核实，查核；中止；打勾；[象棋]将一军
vt. 检查，核对；制止，抑制；在…上打勾

sentences.english: Check the tiles carefully before you buy them.
sentences.chinese: 购买之前要把瓷砖仔细检查一下。

sentences.english: A first rule in solving any mystery is to check the facts.
sentences.chinese: 揭开谜团的第一条规则是核查事实。

sentences.english: The police are failing to take adequate measures to check the growth in crime.
sentences.chinese: 警方未能采取适当的措施来阻止犯罪率上升。

sentences.english: Conduct regular checks on your water quality.
sentences.chinese: 要经常检查水质。

detailed_translations.english: to do something in order to find out whether something really is correct, true, or in good condition
the process of finding out if something is safe, correct, true, or in the condition it should be

name: secretary
trans: n. 秘书；书记；部长；大臣

sentences.english: My secretary will fax you all the details.
sentences.chinese: 我的秘书会把所有的细节发传真给你。

sentences.english: the secretary of the tennis club
sentences.chinese: 网球俱乐部的干事

sentences.english: the Foreign Secretary
sentences.chinese: 外交大臣

detailed_translations.english: someone who works in an office typing letters, keeping records, answering telephone calls, arranging meetings etc

name: bounce
trans: vi. 弹跳；弹起，反跳；弹回

sentences.english: Stop bouncing up and down on the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 别在沙发上蹦来蹦去了。

detailed_translations.english: if a ball or other object bounces, or you bounce it, it immediately moves up or away from a surface after hitting it
the action of moving up and down on a surface

name: ouch
trans: int. 哎哟（突然疼痛时发出的声音）

sentences.english: Ouch! That hurt!
sentences.chinese: 哎唷！ 好疼！

detailed_translations.english: a brooch or clasp set with gems

detailed_translations.chinese: 哎哟（突然疼痛时发出的声音）
detailed_translations.english: a sound that you make when you feel sudden pain

name: separate
trans: adj. 单独的；分开的；不同的；各自的；
vt. 使分离；使分开；使分居

sentences.english: The gym and the sauna are in separate buildings.
sentences.chinese: 健身房和桑拿浴室在不同的大楼里。

detailed_translations.english: not joined to or touching something else

name: behave
trans: vi. 表现；（机器等）运转；举止端正；（事物）起某种作用
vt. 使守规矩；使表现得…

sentences.english: She behaved in a very responsible way .
sentences.chinese: 她表现得很有责任心。

sentences.english: I couldn't believe these people were behaving in this way.
sentences.chinese: 我无法相信这些人竟这样行事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 表现，举止；运转，做出反应
detailed_translations.english: to do things that are good, bad, sensible etc
The way that you behave is the way that you do and say things, and the things that you do and say

name: gentleman
trans: n. 先生；绅士；有身份的人

sentences.english: Could you serve this gentleman please, Miss Bath?
sentences.chinese: 巴思小姐，请你接待一下这位先生好吗？

sentences.english: Good morning, ladies and gentlemen .
sentences.chinese: 早上好，女士们，先生们。

sentences.english: An elderly gentleman was asleep next to the fire.
sentences.chinese: 一位老先生在火炉旁边睡着了。

detailed_translations.english: a polite word for a man, used especially when talking to or about a man you do not know

name: president
trans: n. 总统；董事长；校长；主席

sentences.english: President Bush
sentences.chinese: 布什总统

sentences.english: the president of General Motors
sentences.chinese: 通用汽车公司总裁

detailed_translations.chinese: 总统；（某组织的）最高权力人
detailed_translations.english: the official leader of a country that does not have a king or queen

name: council
trans: n. 委员会；会议；理事会；地方议会；顾问班子

sentences.english: the council for civil liberties
sentences.chinese: 公民自由委员会

sentences.english: the UN Security Council
sentences.chinese: 联合国安全理事会

detailed_translations.english: a group of people that are chosen to make rules, laws, or decisions, or to give advice

name: organization
trans: n. 组织；机构；体制；团体

sentences.english: The public expect high standards from any large organization.
sentences.chinese: 公众对任何大型机构都期望很高。

sentences.english: the World Trade Organization
sentences.chinese: 世界贸易组织

sentences.english: a voluntary organization which helps disabled people with their transport needs
sentences.chinese: 帮助残疾人士满足其交通需求的一个志愿组织

sentences.english: an illegal terrorist organization
sentences.chinese: 非法的恐怖组织

sentences.english: international organizations such as the UN
sentences.chinese: 诸如联合国之类的国际组织

detailed_translations.english: a group such as a club or business that has formed for a particular purpose

name: provide
trans: vt. 提供；规定；准备；装备

sentences.english: Tea and biscuits will be provided.
sentences.chinese: 有茶水和饼干供应。

detailed_translations.english: to give something to someone or make it available to them, because they need it or want it

sentences.english: They had made an agreement that they would share the profits equally.
sentences.chinese: 他们达成协议，平分利润。

sentences.english: Would their discussion result in his agreement to visit his stepmother?
sentences.chinese: 他们商量后，他会不会同意去看望继母？

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement or promise to do something, made by two or more people, companies, organizations etc

sentences.english: The U.S. Constitution promises freedom of religion.
sentences.chinese: 美国宪法保证宗教信仰自由。

sentences.english: a course on philosophy and religion
sentences.chinese: 关于哲学和宗教的课程

sentences.english: the Islamic religion
sentences.chinese: 伊斯兰教

detailed_translations.english: a belief in one or more gods

name: dispute
trans: vt. 辩论；怀疑；阻止；抗拒

sentences.english: It is beyond dispute that advances in medicine have enabled people to live longer.
sentences.chinese: 医学的发展使人们更加长寿，这是无可置疑的。

sentences.english: What happened next is hotly disputed .
sentences.chinese: 关于后来发生了什么，争论很激烈。

detailed_translations.english: a serious argument or disagreement
to argue or disagree with someone

name: olive
trans: n. 橄榄；橄榄树；橄榄色

sentences.english: an olive grove
sentences.chinese: 一片橄榄树林

sentences.english: They are handsome with dark, shining hair, olive skin and fine brown eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他们很帅，有着乌黑闪亮的头发，黄褐色的皮肤，迷人的棕色眼睛。

detailed_translations.english: a small bitter egg-shaped black or green fruit, used as food and for making oil
If someone has olive skin, the colour of their skin is yellowish brown

name: flood
trans: vi. 涌出；涌进；为水淹没

sentences.english: The village was cut off by floods.
sentences.chinese: 那个村子因洪水而与外界中断了联系。

sentences.english: the worst floods for over fifty years
sentences.chinese: 五十多年来最严重的水灾

sentences.english: Towns and cities all over the country have been flooded.
sentences.chinese: 全国各地的城镇都被淹没了。

detailed_translations.english: a very large amount of water that covers an area that is usually dry
to cover a place with water, or to become covered with water

name: snake
trans: vt. 拉（木材等）；迂回前进

sentences.english: A snake slithered across our path.
sentences.chinese: 一条蛇蜿蜒爬过我们的小路。

detailed_translations.english: an animal with a long thin body and no legs, that often has a poisonous bite
if a river, road, train, or line snakes somewhere, it moves in long twisting curves

sentences.english: I’m sorry, there isn’t a lock on the bathroom door.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，浴室门上没有锁。

sentences.english: The key turned stiffly in the lock.
sentences.chinese: 这把钥匙开锁不灵活。

sentences.english: a bike lock
sentences.chinese: 自行车锁

sentences.english: Did you lock the car?
sentences.chinese: 你把汽车锁好了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a thing that keeps a door, drawer etc fastened and is usually opened with a key or by moving a small metal bar
to fasten something, usually with a key, so that other people cannot open it, or to be fastened like this

name: suffer
trans: vi. 遭受，忍受；受痛苦；经验；受损害

sentences.english: At least he died suddenly and didn’t suffer.
sentences.chinese: 至少他死得突然，没有遭罪。

sentences.english: She’s suffering a lot of pain.
sentences.chinese: 她遭受着巨大的痛苦。

detailed_translations.english: to experience physical or mental pain

name: headquarters
trans: n. 总部；指挥部；司令部

sentences.english: the headquarters of the United Nations
sentences.chinese: 联合国总部

sentences.english: Headquarters in Dublin has/have agreed.
sentences.chinese: 都柏林总部已经同意了

detailed_translations.english: the main building or offices used by a large company or organization

name: security
trans: n. 安全；保证；证券；抵押品
adj. 安全的；保安的；保密的

sentences.english: The trial was held under tight security .
sentences.chinese: 这场审讯是在戒备森严的情况下进行的。

sentences.english: lax security at airline check-in desks
sentences.chinese: 登机手续柜台松懈的安全措施

sentences.english: terrorist activity that is a threat to national security
sentences.chinese: 威胁国家安全的恐怖活动

sentences.english: The prison was ordered to tighten security after a prisoner escaped yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天一名囚犯越狱后，该监狱被勒令加强安全措施。

sentences.english: The Security Commission investigates breaches of security .
sentences.chinese: 安全委员会对违反安全规定的事项进行调查。

sentences.english: We have been asked not to say anything for security reasons .
sentences.chinese: 出于安全考虑，我们被要求守口如瓶。

sentences.english: The security forces opened fire, killing two people.
sentences.chinese: 保安部队开枪打死了两个人。

sentences.english: The thief was caught on a security camera .
sentences.chinese: 小偷被保安摄像机当场拍了下来。

sentences.english: There are strict security checks on everyone entering the Opera House.
sentences.chinese: 每个人进入歌剧院都要接受严格的安全检查。

sentences.english: A large number of homes lack adequate security measures .
sentences.chinese: 许多住宅都未采取足够的安全措施。

detailed_translations.english: things that are done to keep a person, building, or country safe from danger or crime

name: permanent
trans: adj. 永久的，永恒的；不变的

sentences.english: He gave up a permanent job in order to freelance.
sentences.chinese: 他放弃了固定工作，为的是当一名自由职业者。

sentences.english: a permanent change in your eating habits
sentences.chinese: 饮食习惯的永久改变

sentences.english: The blindness that the disease causes will be permanent.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病引起的失明是永久性的。

sentences.english: Miller soon became a permanent fixture (= someone or something that is always there ) on the team.
sentences.chinese: 米勒很快就成为球队的固定队员。

detailed_translations.english: continuing to exist for a long time or for all the time in the future

name: situation
trans: n. 情况；形势；处境；位置

sentences.english: The house is in a charming situation, on a wooded hillside.
sentences.chinese: 房子位于林木茂密的小山坡上，环境十分优美。

detailed_translations.english: the type of area where a building is situated - used especially by people who sell or advertise buildings

name: satisfy
trans: vi. 令人满意；令人满足
vt. 满足；说服，使相信；使满意，使高兴

sentences.english: Nothing I did would ever satisfy my father.
sentences.chinese: 我做什么都不能让父亲满意。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel pleased by doing what they want

sentences.english: I wanted that moment to last forever.
sentences.chinese: 我希望那一刻成为永远。

sentences.english: Many valuable works of art were lost forever.
sentences.chinese: 许许多多珍贵的艺术品永远消失了。

sentences.english: He’s forever making comments about my weight.
sentences.chinese: 他老是议论我的体重。

detailed_translations.english: for all future time

name: silence
trans: n. 沉默；寂静；缄默；不谈；无声状态
vt. 使沉默；使安静；压制；消除噪音

sentences.english: There was a brief silence before anyone answered.
sentences.chinese: 沉默了片刻才有人回答。

sentences.english: ‘Silence in court!’ roared the judge.
sentences.chinese: “法庭上请保持肃静！”法官吼道。

sentences.english: The accused exercised his right to silence (= the legal right to choose to say nothing ) .
sentences.chinese: 被告行使了沉默权。

sentences.english: She held up her hand to silence the children.
sentences.chinese: 她抬手示意孩子们安静下来。

detailed_translations.english: complete quiet because nobody is talking
to make someone stop talking, or stop something making a noise

name: silent
trans: adj. 沉默的；寂静的；无记载的

sentences.english: The large house was silent and lonely.
sentences.chinese: 这幢大房子寂静荒凉。

sentences.english: At last the guns fell silent .
sentences.chinese: 枪声终于沉寂了下来。

sentences.english: Julie offered up a silent prayer that she would pass her exam.
sentences.chinese: 朱莉默默地祈祷，希望能通过这次考试。

sentences.english: Alan was silent.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦沉默不语。

detailed_translations.english: without any sound, or not making any sound

name: elder
trans: n. 老人；长辈；年长者；父辈
adj. 年长的；年龄较大的；资格老的

sentences.english: Sarah is the elder of the two.
sentences.chinese: 两人当中萨拉年纪较长。

sentences.english: a meeting of the village elders
sentences.chinese: 村里长辈们的集会

detailed_translations.english: the elder of two people, especially brothers and sisters, is the one who was born first
a member of a tribe or other social group who is important and respected because they are old

name: directly
trans: adv. 直接地；立即；马上；正好地；坦率地

sentences.english: The new property tax law won’t directly affect us.
sentences.chinese: 新的财产税法不会直接影响到我们。

sentences.english: We hope to bring together the countries directly involved in the conflict.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望让直接卷入冲突的各国重归于好。

sentences.english: Most guests left directly after the wake.
sentences.chinese: 守灵仪式一结束，大部分客人就立刻走了。

detailed_translations.english: with no other person, action, process etc between

name: rather
trans: int. 当然啦（回答问题时用）

sentences.english: I grew up in rather unusual circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 我在相当不寻常的环境中长大。

sentences.english: I'm afraid it's a rather long story.
sentences.chinese: 我恐怕这是个相当长的故事。

sentences.english: I’d rather have a quiet night in front of the TV.
sentences.chinese: 我宁愿晚上安安静静地看看电视。

detailed_translations.english: fairly or to some degree

sentences.english: It’s usually available in hardware stores and Chinatown.
sentences.chinese: 它通常在五金商店和唐人街可以买到。

sentences.english: Vancouver has the biggest Chinatown in Canada, boasting a history of more than a century.
sentences.chinese: 温哥华有加拿大最大的唐人街，已经有超过一个世纪的历史。

sentences.english: They then sell the phones to middlemen, usually at electronics stores in Chinatown, for about $750.
sentences.chinese: 把货卖给在唐人街开手机店的中间人，他们能拿回大约750美元。

detailed_translations.english: an area in a city where there are Chinese restaurants and shops, and where a lot of Chinese people live

name: decoration
trans: n. 装饰，装潢；装饰品；奖章

sentences.english: Christmas decorations
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节装饰物

sentences.english: cake decorations
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕上的裱花

detailed_translations.english: something pretty that you put in a place or on top of something to make it look attractive

name: bowl
trans: vt. 投球；旋转；平稳快速移动
vi. 玩保龄球；滑动；平稳快速移动

sentences.english: Mix all the ingredients thoroughly in a large bowl.
sentences.chinese: 将所有配料放在大碗里搅拌均匀。

sentences.english: Fill the bowl with water.
sentences.chinese: 在碗里装满水。

detailed_translations.english: a wide round container that is open at the top, used to hold liquids, food, flowers etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 玩保龄球；滑动；平稳快速移动
detailed_translations.english: to travel along very quickly and smoothly

sentences.english: How well do you know your chopstick etiquette?
sentences.chinese: 对于这些关于筷子的礼仪，你知道多少呢？

sentences.english: My father progged the top of the loaves with a chopstick.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲用一只筷子戳刺面包的顶部

sentences.english: I put down my chopstick, the half eaten pork chop left cold on the plate.
sentences.chinese: 我放下我的筷子，被我吃了一半的排骨躺在盘子上变凉了。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two thin sticks that you use to eat food in many countries in Asia

sentences.english: He spooned instant coffee into two of the mugs.
sentences.chinese: 他用勺把速溶咖啡舀进了两个杯子里。

detailed_translations.english: an object that you use for eating, cooking, or serving food. It has a small bowl-shaped part and a long handle.
to move food with a spoon

sentences.english: Put the knives and forks on the table.
sentences.chinese: 把刀叉摆放在桌子上。

detailed_translations.english: a tool you use for picking up and eating food, with a handle and three or four points
to put food into your mouth or onto a plate using a fork

name: underground
trans: n. 地下；地铁；地道；地下组织；秘密活动；先锋派团体
adj. 地下的；秘密的；先锋派的

sentences.english: This animal spends most of its life underground.
sentences.chinese: 这种动物一生中的大部分时间都待在地下。

sentences.english: nuclear waste buried deep underground
sentences.chinese: 深埋在地下的核废物

detailed_translations.english: under the earth’s surface

detailed_translations.chinese: 地下的；秘密的；先锋派的
detailed_translations.english: below the surface of the earth

detailed_translations.chinese: 地下；地铁；地道；地下组织；秘密活动；先锋派团体
detailed_translations.english: a railway system under the ground

name: lantern
trans: n. 灯笼；提灯；灯笼式天窗

sentences.english: Colour the tiger lantern brown .
sentences.chinese: 把老虎灯笼涂成棕色。

sentences.english: Lantern owners write riddles on a piece of paper and post them on the lanterns.
sentences.chinese: 灯笼的所有者将谜语写在一张纸条上，然后将纸条展示在灯笼上。

sentences.english: To cheer themselves as well as they could, they made an artificial morning with the lantern, some bread and butter, and their own conversation, the real morning being far from come.
sentences.chinese: 为了尽量使自己高兴起来，他们就用提灯制造出人造的黎明，吃着黄油面包，谈天说地，其实真正的黎明还远没有到来。

detailed_translations.english: a lamp that you can carry, consisting of a metal container with glass sides that surrounds a flame or light

name: dragon
trans: n. 龙；凶暴的人，凶恶的人；严厉而有警觉性的女人

sentences.english: She worked a dragon on the new linen cloth.
sentences.chinese: 她在新的亚麻布上绣了条龙。

detailed_translations.english: a large imaginary animal that has wings and a long tail and can breathe out fire

name: temple
trans: n. 庙宇；寺院；神殿；太阳穴

sentences.english: They lighted the temple with many candles.
sentences.chinese: 他们用许多蜡烛照亮这个寺庙。

sentences.english: The entire valley reverberated with the sound of the temple bells.
sentences.chinese: 整个山谷回荡着庙宇的钟声。

sentences.english: After the fire, nothing remained of the magnificent buildings of the temple.
sentences.chinese: 大火过后， 寺院里的那些雄伟建筑已荡然无存。

detailed_translations.english: a building where people go to  worship  , in the Jewish, Hindu, Buddhist, Sikh, and Mormon religions

name: society
trans: n. 社会；交往；社团；社交界

sentences.english: technology and its effects on modern society
sentences.chinese: 科技及其对现代社会的影响

sentences.english: Children are the most vulnerable members of society .
sentences.chinese: 儿童是最脆弱的社会成员。

detailed_translations.english: people in general, considered in relation to the laws, organizations etc that make it possible for them to live together

name: generation
trans: n. 一代；产生；一代人；生殖

sentences.english: Like most of my generation, I had never known a war.
sentences.chinese: 和我们这一代的大多数人一样，我并没有经历过战争。

sentences.english: In my generation the divorce rate is very high.
sentences.chinese: 我们这一代人离婚率很高。

trans: adj. 谦虚的，谦逊的；适度的；端庄的；羞怯的

trans: n. 美德；优点；贞操；功效

detailed_translations.english: moral goodness of character and behaviour

name: private
trans: adj. 私人的；私有的；私下的

sentences.chinese: 莫里斯拥有一架私人喷气式飞机。

sentences.chinese: 他记了些笔记供自己所用。

sentences.chinese: 穿着考究的老妇人

sentences.chinese: 对此次爆炸事件原因的官方调查

sentences.chinese: ...俄罗斯国会。

someone from Russia

sentences.chinese: 噪声大的发动机

sentences.chinese: 长子继承家产的传统

sentences.chinese: 根据传统习俗，婚礼的费用由新娘的父母承担。

sentences.chinese: 你告诉杰夫这个工作时，他是什么反应？

sentences.chinese: 说他撒谎，他非常生气。

name: officer

sentences.chinese: 前内阁官员

sentences.english: a commanding officer of the SAS
sentences.chinese: 英国空军特种部队的一名指挥官

detailed_translations.english: someone who is in a position in an organization or the government

sentences.chinese: 两名警察在一次枪战中丧生。

sentences.chinese: 一个小木玩偶

sentences.chinese: 家庭是现代社会的基本单位。

sentences.chinese: 一定是弄错了，这些书不全是我订的。

sentences.chinese: 坎贝尔的一条腿骨折，可能需要手术。

sentences.english: What’s required is a complete reorganization of the system.
sentences.chinese: 需要做的是彻底整顿整个系统。

sentences.chinese: 大多数室内盆栽植物需要定期浇水。

name: communication

sentences.chinese: 无线电是飞行员唯一的通信手段。

sentences.chinese: 沟通失败。

sentences.chinese: 我六岁时父母离婚，我对父亲几乎一无所知。

sentences.chinese: 如今几乎没有人给我写信了。

sentences.chinese: 爸爸几乎没吃什么东西。

sentences.chinese: 最好的解决方法是他们分开。

sentences.chinese: 民众对政府越来越不满。

sentences.chinese: 最让我生气的是他居然毫无悔意。

sentences.english: interpersonal communication
sentences.chinese: 人际沟通

sentences.chinese: 我持爱尔兰护照。

sentences.chinese: 父母负责督促子女上学上课，这是天经地义的事。

sentences.chinese: 针对年轻听众的新节目

sentences.english: Dr. Brian was a good listener.
sentences.chinese: 布赖恩医生是一位不错的倾听者。

detailed_translations.english: someone who listens to the radio

sentences.english: The town is cut off from contact with the outside world.
sentences.chinese: 小镇与外界的联系被切断了。

sentences.english: Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any queries.
sentences.chinese: 你如果有任何疑问，尽管和我联系。

detailed_translations.english: communication with a person, organization, country etc

name: promise
trans: vt. 允诺，许诺；给人以…的指望或希望
vi. 许诺；有指望，有前途

sentences.english: If you make a promise, you should keep it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你许下一个诺言，你就应该遵守它。

sentences.english: Last night the headmaster promised a full investigation.
sentences.chinese: 校长昨晚允诺进行全面调查。

detailed_translations.english: a statement that you will definitely do or provide something or that something will definitely happen

sentences.english: Our flight was cancelled.
sentences.chinese: 我们的航班取消了。

sentences.english: I’m afraid I’ll have to cancel our meeting tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我得取消我们明天的会议。

sentences.english: You’ll just have to ring John and cancel.
sentences.chinese: 你只能打电话给约翰取消了。

detailed_translations.english: to decide that something that was officially planned will not happen

name: figure
trans: n. 数字；人物；图形；价格；（人的）体形；画像
vt. 计算；认为；描绘；象征
vi. 计算；出现；扮演角色

sentences.english: Reform now figures high on the agenda.
sentences.chinese: 眼下，改革是当务之急。

detailed_translations.english: to be an important part of a process, event, or situation, or to be included in something

detailed_translations.chinese: 数字；人物；算术；体型，风姿；轮廓；画像，塑像；图，图形
detailed_translations.english: the activity of adding, multiplying etc numbers

detailed_translations.chinese: 计算； 认为， 猜想
detailed_translations.english: to form a particular opinion after thinking about a situation

sentences.english: They had great difficulty in finding a replacement.
sentences.chinese: 他们找接替的人费了很大劲

sentences.english: If you have any difficulties, give me a call.
sentences.chinese: 如果你遇到困难，就给我打电话。

sentences.english: She soon got into difficulty with debt.
sentences.chinese: 她很快就因债务陷入了困境。

detailed_translations.english: if you have difficulty doing something, it is difficult for you to do

sentences.english: On the day they visited him, Professor Huggins was dining.
sentences.chinese: 警方拜访哈金斯教授的那天，他正在进餐。

sentences.english: He dines alone most nights.
sentences.chinese: 大多数晚上他都独自进餐。

detailed_translations.english: When you dine, you have dinner

name: simply
trans: adv. 简单地；仅仅；简直；朴素地；坦白地

sentences.english: Try to express yourself more simply.
sentences.chinese: 尽量把你的意思表达得更简单明了。

sentences.english: To put it simply, the tax cuts mean the average person will be about 3% better off.
sentences.chinese: 简单地说，这次减税意味着普通人的收入将增加 3% 左右。

sentences.english: We had to live very simply on my father’s small salary.
sentences.chinese: 我们只能靠父亲微薄的工资过着非常简朴的生活。

name: somehow
trans: adv. 以某种方法；莫名其妙地

sentences.english: Don’t worry, we’ll get the money back somehow.
sentences.chinese: 别担心，我们总会把那些钱拿回来的。

sentences.english: Somehow, I managed to lose my keys.
sentences.chinese: 我不知怎的竟然把钥匙弄丢了。

sentences.english: Maybe we could glue it together somehow or other .
sentences.chinese: 也许我们可以想什么办法把它粘起来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 由于某种原因， 不知怎么的； 以某种方式
detailed_translations.english: in some way, or by some means, although you do not know how

sentences.english: The ability to adapt is a definite asset in this job.
sentences.chinese: 适应能力是做这份工作的绝对有利条件。

sentences.english: Many children buy books after they have been adapted for television.
sentences.chinese: 许多小孩子都是在书被改编成电视剧之后才去买的。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually change your behaviour and attitudes in order to be successful in a new situation

name: universal
trans: adj. 普遍的；通用的；宇宙的；全世界的；全体的

sentences.english: free universal healthcare
sentences.chinese: 免费的全民保健制度

sentences.english: These stories have universal appeal.
sentences.chinese: 这些故事人人都喜欢。

sentences.english: a topic of universal interest
sentences.chinese: 人们普遍感兴趣的一个话题

sentences.english: a universal truth
sentences.chinese: 普遍的真理

detailed_translations.chinese: 宇宙的，全世界的；普遍的
detailed_translations.english: involving everyone in the world or in a particular group

name: absent
trans: adj. 缺席的；缺少的；心不在焉的；茫然的

sentences.english: The dull, absent look on her face implied boredom.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上呆滞、茫然的神情说明她觉得无聊了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缺席的；缺少的；心不在焉的；茫然的
detailed_translations.english: not at work, school, a meeting etc, because you are sick or decide not to go
to not go to a place or take part in an event where people expect you to be

name: trouble
trans: n. 麻烦；烦恼；故障；动乱

sentences.english: Recent stock market losses point to trouble ahead.
sentences.chinese: 最近股市的下跌预示着未来将有麻烦。

detailed_translations.english: problems or difficulties
to say something or ask someone to do something which may use or waste their time or upset them

sentences.english: I can’t tell you. It’s a secret.
sentences.chinese: 我不能告诉你，这是个秘密。

sentences.english: It was no secret that the two men hated each other.
sentences.chinese: 这两个男人相互仇视，这算不得什么秘密。

sentences.english: Don’t worry. Your secret is safe with me (= I won’t tell anyone about it ) .
sentences.chinese: 别担心，我会替你保守秘密。

sentences.english: Your hair always looks so great – what’s your secret ?
sentences.chinese: 你的头发看起来总是很漂亮——你的秘诀是什么？

sentences.english: They kept their relationship secret from their parents.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩的关系瞒着父母。

detailed_translations.english: something that is kept hidden or that is known about by only a few people
known about by only a few people and kept hidden from others

name: moment
trans: n. 片刻，瞬间，时刻；重要，契机

sentences.english: It was one of the most exciting moments in his life.
sentences.chinese: 这是他一生中最激动人心的时刻之一。

sentences.english: She may be in trouble at this very moment and trying to call you.
sentences.chinese: 此时此刻她可能遇到了麻烦，正想方设法给你打电话。

sentences.english: I remember the moment when I first saw him after the operation.
sentences.chinese: 我还记得手术后第一次见到他的那一刻。

sentences.english: Quinn always seems to be in the right place at the crucial moment.
sentences.chinese: 奎因似乎总能在关键时刻把握时机。

sentences.english: I just this moment (= only a very short time ago ) arrived and already Dan wants to know when I’m leaving.
sentences.chinese: 我才刚到，丹就想知道我什么时候走。

sentences.english: At this moment in time it would be inappropriate to comment on the situation.
sentences.chinese: 这个时候恐怕不宜对局势作出评论。

sentences.english: It was quiet for a moment, then Rae spoke.
sentences.chinese: 沉寂了片刻，然后雷开始说话了。

detailed_translations.english: a particular point in time

name: tap
trans: vt. 轻敲；轻打；装上嘴子

sentences.english: She felt a tap on her shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得有人轻轻拍了拍她的肩膀。

sentences.english: I went up and tapped on the window.
sentences.chinese: 我走上去轻轻敲敲窗户。

detailed_translations.english: an act of hitting something lightly, especially to get someone’s attention
to hit your fingers lightly on something, for example to get someone’s attention

name: familiar
trans: adj. 熟悉的；常见的；亲近的

sentences.english: a familiar tune
sentences.chinese: 熟悉的曲调

sentences.english: It was a relief to be back in familiar surroundings .
sentences.chinese: 回到熟悉的环境里让人松了一口气。

sentences.english: Beggars on the street are becoming a familiar sight .
sentences.chinese: 街上出现乞丐的情况逐渐变得屡见不鲜。

sentences.english: This kind of situation was all too familiar (= very familiar ) to John.
sentences.chinese: 这种情形对约翰来说太熟悉了。

sentences.english: Her face seems vaguely familiar , but I can’t quite place her.
sentences.chinese: 她看起来有点面熟，但我还是认不出她来。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is familiar is well-known to you and easy to recognize

name: boss
trans: vt. 指挥，调遣；当…的领导

sentences.english: I’ll have to ask my boss for a day off.
sentences.chinese: 我得向老板请一天假。

sentences.english: Since I’m my own boss (=  I work for myself, rather than for an employer  ) , my hours are flexible.
sentences.chinese: 我自己当老板，所以我的时间很灵活。

sentences.english: Five-year-old girls love to boss people around.
sentences.chinese: 五岁的女孩就爱支使别人。

name: manage
trans: vt. 管理；经营；控制；设法

sentences.chinese: 他被要求去管理一个新的部门。

sentences.english: Managing a football team is harder than you think.
sentences.chinese: 管理一支足球队比你想象的要难。

sentences.english: The company had been very badly managed.
sentences.chinese: 公司管理非常糟糕。

sentences.english: I don’t know how I’ll manage it , but I’ll be there.
sentences.chinese: 我还不知道怎么去，但我会去的。

sentences.english: I don’t know how she manages with seven children.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道七个孩子她是怎么应付的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 管理；设法；成功应付，对付

name: doubt
trans: v. 怀疑；不信；恐怕；拿不准

sentences.chinese: 他的心头仍有一丝挥之不去的疑虑。

sentences.english: Kim never doubted his story.
sentences.chinese: 例句：金对于他讲的事情从不怀疑。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of being not sure whether something is true or right
to think that something may not be true or that it is unlikely

sentences.english: The country’s wealth comes from its oil.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家的财富来自石油。

sentences.english: the distribution of wealth
sentences.chinese: 财富的分配

sentences.english: The purpose of industry is to create wealth.
sentences.chinese: 工业的目的就是创造财富。

detailed_translations.chinese: 财富； 财产； 丰富
detailed_translations.english: a large amount of money, property etc that a person or country owns

name: astronaut
trans: n. 宇航员，航天员；太空旅行者

sentences.english: So why become an astronaut at all?
sentences.chinese: 那么，为什么要成为一名宇航员呢？

sentences.english: Yes, I have wanted to be an astronaut.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我想过成为一个宇航员。

sentences.english: Many different qualities go towards the making of an astronaut.
sentences.chinese: 一名宇航员必须具备许多不同的素质。

detailed_translations.english: someone who travels and works in a spacecraft

sentences.english: I need the money. And besides, when I agree to do something, I do it.
sentences.chinese: 我需要这笔钱，而且，我一旦答应做什么事情就会做到。

sentences.chinese: 那个地方有迷人的景色、美丽的沙滩，除此之外还有很多很多。

detailed_translations.english: used when adding another reason

name: weekday
trans: n. 平日，普通日；工作日

sentences.chinese: 如果你想避开人流，最好在工作日来。

name: primary
trans: adj. 主要的；初级的；基本的

sentences.chinese: 我们的头等大事是向难民提供食品和医疗。

sentences.english: Many of the villagers rely on fishing as their primary source of income.
sentences.chinese: 很多村民以打鱼作为他们的主要收入来源。

sentences.english: Personal safety is of primary importance .
sentences.chinese: 人身安全至关重要。

detailed_translations.chinese: 首要的， 主要的； 基本的； 最初的， 初级的
detailed_translations.english: most important

name: asleep
trans: adj. 睡着的；麻木的；长眠的
adv. 熟睡地；进入睡眠状态

sentences.english: Quiet! The baby’s asleep.
sentences.chinese: 安静！ 宝宝在睡觉。

detailed_translations.english: sleeping

name: notebook
trans: n. 笔记本，笔记簿；手册

sentences.chinese: 把这一页抄到你的笔记本上。

sentences.english: She rummaged in the desk drawers for her notebook.
sentences.chinese: 她在书桌抽屉里翻找她的笔记本。

sentences.english: She immediately copied the letter in her notebook.
sentences.chinese: 她立即把这封信抄在她的笔记本里。

detailed_translations.english: a book made of plain paper on which you can write notes

trans: n. 回顾；复习；评论；检讨；检阅
vi. 回顾；复习功课；写评论

sentences.chinese: 政府将在今年晚些时候对形势重新加以研究。

sentences.english: The decision will be reviewed by the Supreme Court.
sentences.chinese: 这个判决将由最高法院复核。

sentences.english: The team manager’s position will be reviewed at the end of the season.
sentences.chinese: 球队主教练的人选将在赛季末重新考虑。

sentences.english: If you have to cover 12 chapters in American history, begin by planning on three two-hour reviews with four chapters per session.
sentences.chinese: 如果你必须涵盖美国史的12个章节，首先计划3次2小时的复习，每次4章。

(North Amercian English) a lesson in which you look again at sth you have studied, especially in order to prepare for an exam

sentences.english: The cat lay on the sofa, washing itself.
sentences.chinese: 猫躺在沙发上把自己舔干。

sentences.english: The machine switches itself off when the process is complete.
sentences.chinese: 工作程序结束，机器会自动关闭。

sentences.english: a small local enterprise that has transformed itself into a highly successful company
sentences.chinese: 已发展为业绩喜人的公司的一家小型地方企业

detailed_translations.english: used to show that a thing, organization, animal, or baby that does something is affected by its own action

sentences.english: He took a credit card out of his wallet.
sentences.chinese: 他从钱包里拿出一张信用卡。

detailed_translations.english: a small flat case, often made of leather, that you carry in your pocket, for holding paper money, bank cards etc

sentences.english: He was now the proud owner of a bright red sports car.
sentences.chinese: 他现在拥有了一辆亮红色跑车，很是自豪。

detailed_translations.english: someone who owns something

name: row
trans: n. 行，排；划船；街道；吵闹

sentences.english: a family row
sentences.chinese: 家庭争吵

sentences.english: He had just had a row with his wife.
sentences.chinese: 他刚刚和妻子吵了一架。

detailed_translations.english: a short angry argument, especially between people who know each other well

name: senior
trans: n. 上司；较年长者；毕业班学生
adj. 高级的；年长的；地位较高的；年资较深的，资格较老的

sentences.english: Seniors can get a 10% discount.
sentences.chinese: 老年人可以享受10%的折扣。

detailed_translations.english: a  senior citizen

name: speech
trans: n. 演讲；讲话；[语] 语音；演说

sentences.english: He has to make a lot of after-dinner speeches .
sentences.chinese: 他经常要发表席后演说。

sentences.english: Collins gave the keynote speech (= most important speech ) .
sentences.chinese: 科林斯作了主题发言。

detailed_translations.chinese: 演讲；讲话；[语] 语音；演说
detailed_translations.english: a talk, especially a formal one about a particular subject, given to a group of people

name: period
trans: n. 周期，期间；时期；月经；课时；（语法学）句点，句号

sentences.english: Tomorrow’s weather will be dry with sunny periods.
sentences.chinese: 明天天气干燥，间或晴朗。

sentences.english: a double period of Science
sentences.chinese: 一连两节的自然科学课

sentences.english: Pay attention to punctuation, especially to the correct use of commas and periods.
sentences.chinese: 注意标点，特别是逗号和句号的正确使用方法。

detailed_translations.english: a particular length of time with a beginning and an end

name: valuable
trans: adj. 有价值的；贵重的；可估价的

name: achieve
trans: vt. 取得；获得；实现；成功
vi. 达到预期的目的，实现预期的结果，如愿以偿

sentences.english: Frances achieved very good exam results.
sentences.chinese: 弗朗西丝考试取得了优异成绩。

sentences.english: Wilson has achieved considerable success as an artist.
sentences.chinese: 威尔逊作为一名艺术家成就斐然。

sentences.english: She eventually achieved her goal of becoming a professor.
sentences.chinese: 她终于实现目标，当上了教授。

detailed_translations.english: to successfully complete something or get a good result, especially by working hard

sentences.english: She asked the doctor to speak to her parents on her behalf.
sentences.chinese: 她请医生代她同她父母谈谈。

sentences.english: On behalf of everyone here, may I wish you a very happy retirement.
sentences.chinese: 请允许我代表在座的各位祝你退休后生活愉快。

detailed_translations.english: instead of someone, or as their representative

sentences.english: letters of congratulation
sentences.chinese: 祝贺信

sentences.english: Give Oscar my congratulations.
sentences.chinese: 请向奥斯卡转达我的祝贺。

detailed_translations.english: when you tell someone that you are happy because they have achieved something or because something nice has happened to them

sentences.english: the son of a wealthy merchant
sentences.chinese: 一名富商的儿子

sentences.english: There's been a big reduction in the size of the merchant fleet in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来商船队的数量大为缩减。

detailed_translations.english: someone who buys and sells goods in large quantities
Merchant seamen or ships are involved in carrying goods for trade

name: mall
trans: n. 购物商场；林荫路；铁圈球场

sentences.english: In the winter I head for the mall.
sentences.chinese: 在冬日里,我前往这个购物商场。

sentences.english: If you see something you like at the mall, walk away.
sentences.chinese: 如果在商城里看见某件你喜欢的东西，（别买）走开。

name: faint
trans: adj. 模糊的；头晕的；虚弱的；[医] 衰弱的
vi. 昏倒；变得微弱；变得没气力

sentences.english: She gave a faint smile.
sentences.chinese: 她淡淡一笑。

sentences.english: a very faint noise
sentences.chinese: 很微弱的声响

sentences.english: the faint light of dawn
sentences.chinese: 微弱的晨光

detailed_translations.chinese: 模糊的；头晕的；虚弱的；[医] 衰弱的
detailed_translations.english: difficult to see, hear, smell etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 昏倒；变得微弱；变得没气力
detailed_translations.english: to suddenly become unconscious for a short time
an act of becoming unconscious

name: agency
trans: n. 代理，中介；代理处，经销处

sentences.english: a UN agency responsible for helping refugees
sentences.chinese: 负责为难民提供帮助的联合国机构

sentences.english: the Environmental Protection Agency
sentences.chinese: 环保局

detailed_translations.english: an organization or department, especially within a government, that does a specific job

name: definitely
trans: adv. 清楚地，当然；明确地，肯定地

sentences.english: ‘Do you reckon Margot will be there?’ ‘ Definitely not .’
sentences.chinese: “你估计玛戈会在那里吗？” “肯定不会。”

sentences.english: The hotel fitness centre is definitely worth a visit.
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店的健身中心绝对值得一去。

sentences.english: I definitely need a holiday.
sentences.chinese: 我太需要休假了。

detailed_translations.english: without any doubt

name: regret doing ...
trans: 后悔做过某事；后悔干了某事；后悔做了某事

sentences.english: When people become newly infected with HIV, they often have a fever and minor illness at the time but rarely know what it is.
sentences.chinese: 当人们受艾滋病病毒重新感染时，他们常常同时有发烧和轻微不适，但很少知道它是什么。

sentences.english: Now they know how to fight it – by sleeping under insecticide-treated nets and seeking medical care at the dispensary when they have a fever.
sentences.chinese: 现在他们知道如何与该病作斗争 — 通过在经杀虫剂处理的蚊帐里睡觉和在发烧时到诊所寻求医疗。

sentences.english: Why don't you get dressed now?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么现在还不穿好衣服？

sentences.english: For me, the hardest part of a day is getting ready in the morning; I’d much rather sit down with a cup of joe and check my email than take a shower, get dressed, and take my son to daycare.
sentences.chinese: 对我来说，一天中最难的部分就是早晨上班前的准备；我更愿意坐下来喝上一杯咖啡，查看电邮，之后再洗个澡，穿好衣服，再送儿子去日托所。

sentences.english: Grabbed me by my arm, had me get dressed, and drove me in to school.
sentences.chinese: 她抓着我的手臂，让我穿好衣服，然后开车送我去学校。

sentences.english: If he looked away, I could find the answer right away.
sentences.chinese: 只要他的眼睛往窗外看一看，我就立刻能找到答案。

sentences.english: But for critical messages, where administrators need the information right away, these messages can be sent immediately to the console.
sentences.chinese: 但是，对于重要消息，如果管理员立刻需要相关信息，则可以立即将这些消息发送到控制台。

detailed_translations.english: immediately; without delay

name: Fear makes the wolf bigger than he is.

sentences.english: But even in this "concertinaed" timeline - extending millions of centuries into the future, as well as into the past - this century is special.
sentences.chinese: 不过，即使在这张向未来、向过去延伸数百万世纪的“折叠式”时间表上，本世纪也是特别的一个世纪。

name: take a risk
trans: na. 冒险；【保险】承保…的险；承受保险

sentences.english: Isn’t he taking a bit of a risk in coming here?
sentences.chinese: 他来这儿不是有点冒险吗？

sentences.chinese: 今天他能够将重点聚焦在经济方面。

name: take out

sentences.chinese: 他吹笛子好让我们跳舞。

name: go on

sentences.chinese: 从那时起我就不再喜欢滑冰了。

sentences.english: Being given first aid at the scene of the accident probably saved his life.
sentences.chinese: 他在事故现场得到急救，这可能救了他的命。

detailed_translations.english: simple medical treatment that is given as soon as possible to someone who is injured or who suddenly becomes ill

name: set up
trans: na. 建立；创立；发起；开办

sentences.english: The two sides agreed to set up a commission to investigate claims.
sentences.chinese: 双方同意成立一个委员会，调查索赔问题。

sentences.english: ...an organization which sets up meetings about issues of interest to women.
sentences.chinese: …一个安排有关妇女利益问题的会议组织。

detailed_translations.english: If you set something up, you create or arrange it

sentences.english: She sheered off in time to avoid an accident.
sentences.chinese: 轮船及时转向，避免了一次事故。

sentences.english: The jet was descending steeply, but its pilot was able to pull it out just in time.
sentences.chinese: 这架喷气式飞机直线下降，但飞行员及时制止了飞机的俯冲。

sentences.english: In order to catch the train in time, he polished off two bowls of rice in 5 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 为了及时赶上火车， 他在5分钟内就把两碗饭狼吞虎咽地吃光了。

sentences.chinese: 突然，灯都灭了。

sentences.chinese: 你为什么不上楼躺一会儿？

sentences.english: We eventually took off at 11 o'clock and arrived in Juneau at 1:30.
sentences.chinese: 我们终于在11点起飞，1:30到达朱诺。

sentences.english: He took off at once and headed back to the motel.
sentences.chinese: 他出人意料地立刻就离开了，然后回到了那家汽车旅馆。

detailed_translations.chinese: 中文释义:（飞机等）起飞；匆忙离开
detailed_translations.english: When an aeroplane takes off, it leaves the ground and starts flying

detailed_translations.english: If you run away from a place, you leave it because you are unhappy there

sentences.chinese: 这项命令已不再生效。

sentences.chinese: 他再也抗拒不住她的魅力。

sentences.english: She no longer feared that they should misunderstand her.
sentences.chinese: 她不再害怕他们会误解她了。

detailed_translations.english: a children’s story in which magical things happen

trans: v. (飞机)起飞；出去；拿掉；移送

sentences.english: This is because objects may be made up of other objects.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为对象可能是由其他对象构成的。

sentences.english: Why do scientists think something could be hidden beyond the edge of our solar system?
sentences.chinese: 为什么科学家认为可能有某种东西潜藏在太阳系的边缘？

detailed_translations.english: the Sun and the  planets  that go around it

sentences.chinese: 即使通过了高级程度考试，她以后找工作也还是成问题。

sentences.english: In general, all of these hosts can be different.
sentences.chinese: 一般地，所有的这些主机都可以是不同的。

trans: na. ￡ 500 a week 每星期卖得五百镑

sentences.chinese: 正如前面所提到的，这个分组需要在适当的位置处理当前的分支策略。

trans: na. 被包入；被卷入漩涡

sentences.english: Whereas if only I and a couple of other people like it, then it must be really something special.
sentences.chinese: 然而，如果只有我自己和几个别的什么人喜欢，那么它一定真的很特别了。

sentences.english: For instance, "in her family there were a couple of other queens and princesses that had atherosclerosis, so a genetic element cannot be excluded," Allam said.
sentences.chinese: 例如，奥勒姆说：”在她的家族里有两个皇后和两个公主患有动脉粥样硬化，所以基因是不能排除在外的因素。

sentences.english: We worked for a couple of weeks (off and on) and finally solved this problem.
sentences.chinese: 我工作了两个周（断断续续的）最终解决了这个问题。

sentences.english: There was an old action movie next.
sentences.chinese: 接下来演的是一部老动作片。

sentences.english: Instead of going to see an action movie, take action in your own life.
sentences.chinese: 与其看动作片，不如花点心思在你的生活上。

trans: n. 科幻小说；科幻电影

sentences.english: So real that some people are asking whether science fiction should now be converted into science fact.
sentences.chinese: 同样现实的是很多人疑问是否科幻小说现在应该转换成科技事实了。

sentences.english: This scene is science fiction now, but it might not be for much longer.
sentences.chinese: 现在这种情景仅仅是科幻小说，但不久的将来很可能成为现实。

detailed_translations.english: stories about events in the future which are affected by imaginary developments in science, for example about travelling in time or to other  planets  with life on them

trans: na. 进行得 (well； badly)；(话等)冒出

sentences.english: Then the fire alarm went off. I just grabbed my clothes and ran out.
sentences.chinese: 之后火警响了，我只抓起衣服就跑了出去。

detailed_translations.english: If an alarm bell goes off, it makes a sudden loud noise

sentences.english: Jack and Helen had dropped behind in order to be alone.
sentences.chinese: 为了单独呆在一起，杰克和海伦故意让别人走在前面。

sentences.english: He polished off his work in order to see his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 为了去见女朋友，他匆忙地做完手头的工作。

sentences.english: She decathected from him in order to cope with his impending bankruptcy.
sentences.chinese: 为了对付他的即将来临的破产，她不再依恋他。

sentences.english: I can eat what I want but I never put on weight.
sentences.chinese: 我想吃什么就能吃什么，而体重从不增加。

detailed_translations.english: If someone puts on weight, they become heavier

name: break down

sentences.english: Their car broke down.
sentences.chinese: 他们的车抛锚了。

detailed_translations.english: If a machine or a vehicle breaks down, it stops working.

sentences.english: This note to the bank matured the day before yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 这张银行票据前天到期了。

sentences.english: And she has fasted ever since the day before yesterday's walk, from sorrow and rage that I dispatched her out of your society under the idea of its being unacceptable.
sentences.chinese: 而且自从前天散步以后她就又难过又愤怒，以致不吃不喝，就因为我把她从你身旁打发走了，认为你是不会接受她的。

sentences.english: It will mean that we shall have had our breakfast of the day before yesterday, our breakfast of yesterday, our dinner of to-day, and all that at once, and this morning.
sentences.chinese: 我们会在今天早上把前天的早饭、前天的晚饭、昨天的早饭、昨天的晚饭，做一顿同时全吃下去。 嘿！

detailed_translations.english: a written message that is sent or received on a  mobile phone  or  pager

trans: na. (大学与中学中之)学生会

sentences.english: He calmed down in the end.
sentences.chinese: 他的情绪终于平定下来。

sentences.english: There really is no time like the present, and if you miss it…well…we all go away in the end.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，没有其他时间像是现在一样，如果你错过了现在……那么……我们最后都会死去。

name: reach an agreement
trans: 达成协议；达成一致；达成共识

sentences.english: This is quite an amazing feat seeing as how it had to rise up after the end of World War II when it found itself almost destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 日本在第二次世界大战结束时几乎完全摧毁，看到它能如此迅速地崛起，这可真算得上是一个令人吃惊的业绩。

sentences.english: Surf and spray scatter as a large wave crashes onto the shore in Palau. More than 250 islands make up the country, a Japanese stronghold during World War II.
sentences.chinese: 作为巨大波涛的海浪和浪花崩溃在帕劳的海岸，由250多个岛屿组成国家，这些岛屿是第二次世界大战期间日本的据点。

trans: na. (第二次大战后成立的)联合国

trans: 联合国安理会；联合国安全理事会

sentences.english: I waited in silence.
sentences.chinese: 我沉默地等待着。

sentences.english: I started to be more present. I meditate more and I stay in silence more.
sentences.chinese: 我开始更加注重现在。每天都会让自己有更多的冥想和沉默。

sentences.english: When reading that book, I got great pleasure. Of course, I was in silence then.
sentences.chinese: 阅读那本书时，我得到了很大的乐趣——当然，当时我在沉默中。

name: keep silent
trans: 沉默；保持沉默；保持安静

sentences.english: I think you’d call it a lecture rather than a talk.
sentences.chinese: 我说啊，这是训斥，不是谈话。

detailed_translations.english: instead of

name: in common
trans: un. 和…有相通之处；公有

sentences.english: We also tend to be similar to our friends and family on income and wealth measures.
sentences.chinese: 我们在收入和财富衡量标准方面也趋向于我们的朋友和家庭成员。

sentences.english: Their motivation is other than me.
sentences.chinese: 他们的动机不同于我的。

name: human being
trans: adj. 人的；有人性的；显示人类特点的

sentences.english: The treatment will be tried out on human beings only after it has been shown to be safe and foolproof in animals.
sentences.chinese: 该疗法只有在动物身上证明安全、万无一失后才会在人体上试用。

detailed_translations.english: A human being is a man, woman, or child

name: Central America
trans: n. 中美洲（包括危地马拉、伯利兹、洪都拉斯、萨尔瓦多、尼加拉瓜、哥斯达黎加以及巴拿马）

trans: v. 挂断电话；挂机；悬挂；耽搁

name: police officer
trans: n. 警官；警察；警务人员

sentences.english: The police officer said your country [Pakistan] is not secure but I still prefer to live there. I love my country.
sentences.chinese: 警官说你们巴基斯坦现在也不安全，但是我仍然希望回到祖国去生活，我爱我的祖国。

sentences.english: The laws specify, for example, that the police officer administering a photo or live lineup should not know who the suspect is, and the witness should be told that the officer does not know.
sentences.chinese: 法律详细规定的有，如，警官在处理照片或一列待指认嫌疑人时不能先入为主地知道谁是嫌犯，而目击证人在指证时也应被告知，警察不知道谁是嫌犯。

sentences.english: The police officer led him to a beautiful garden with lots of grass, pretty flowers, and manicured hedges.
sentences.chinese: 警官带着他到一个很美的花园，里面有很多的草，很多的花，修剪好的树坪。

detailed_translations.english: a member of the police

sentences.chinese: 你和别人相处得怎样？

sentences.english: I’m not satisfied with the way he cut my hair.
sentences.chinese: 我对他给我理的发型不满意。

sentences.chinese: 这是否意味着我们能够前进到在我们前面的那些宇宙里去拜访他们？

name: figure out
trans: na. 估计；解决；了解；〈口〉确定

sentences.english: Then figure out one practical solution you can take for each of those pieces.
sentences.chinese: 接着想出一个实用性的方法用于解决每一小部分的问题。

name: cool down

sentences.english: The next morning, each one went down to get breakfast in the dining hall of their respective dorms.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早上，男女双方径直回到自己的宿舍餐厅吃早饭。

sentences.chinese: 为了检验这个假设，研究者在斯坦福大学食堂门口发放关于约会和吃饭的问卷，一些在进去的时候填，另一些被试在出来的时候填写。

name: adapt to

sentences.chinese: 我们必须适应它。

sentences.english: How do you adapt to that, especially with the lack of resources there?
sentences.chinese: 你如何适应那种情况，特别是在缺乏资源的情况下？

sentences.english: But some warn that if they cannot adapt to the changing market they will "die of hunger".
sentences.chinese: 但也有一些人警告说，如果他们无法适应不断变化的市场，这些书摊终会“饿死”。

name: so far
trans: na. 就是那么些；到现在为止；到目前(此地)为止；就此范围来说

sentences.english: Wang agreed to sell IBM Systems last year after it ran into financial problems.
sentences.chinese: IBM公司遭遇财政问题后，王去年同意出售该公司的操作系统。

detailed_translations.english: If you run into problems or difficulties, you unexpectedly begin to experience them

sentences.english: I look forward to hearing from you (= hope to receive news from you ).
sentences.chinese: 我盼望着你的来信。

sentences.english: I can not fall asleep after drinking coffee this late.
sentences.chinese: 现在这么晚了，喝咖啡之后我不能入睡。

sentences.english: And only then as I finally fall asleep do I register the blood I saw on the sock when I wiped my leg, the blood from my piss. I sleep.
sentences.chinese: 我想到了家，这个很管用，我开始昏昏欲睡，我终于注意到我擦大腿的那只袜子上的血迹，尿出来的血，却马上睡着了。

sentences.english: I said his heaven would be only half alive; and he said mine would be drunk: I said I should fall asleep in his; and he said he could not breathe in mine, and began to grow very snappish.
sentences.chinese: 我说他的天堂是半死不活的；他说我的天堂是发酒疯；我说我在他的天堂里一定要睡着的；他说他在我的天堂里就要喘不过气来，于是他开始变得非常暴躁。

trans: 站起来；自己站起来；振作起来

sentences.english: He spoke on behalf of all the members of the faculty and staff.
sentences.chinese: 他代表全体教职员工讲了话。

sentences.english: There is one database heap per database, and the database manager uses it on behalf of all applications connected to the database.
sentences.chinese: 每个数据库都有一个数据库堆，数据库管理器使用它来代表连接到数据库上的所有应用程序。

detailed_translations.english: as the representative of sb or instead of them

name: hold out
trans: na. 伸出；提出；维持；制止

sentences.english: One prisoner was still holding out on the roof of the jail.
sentences.chinese: 一名囚犯仍在监狱的屋顶上拒不投降。

detailed_translations.english: If you hold out, you manage to resist an enemy or opponent in difficult circumstances and refuse to give in

name: keep one's eye on
trans: 照看，照管，照顾；密切注视，监视；注意；留神
